creditline: Gift of Paul Maurer and Scott West
description: green ground at top, yellow ground at bottom; yellow and red head and torso of Christ handing a lily, with a flaming heart on his chest, at top; purple upside-down sketchy skulls and swastikas, with head and torso of skeleton wearing crown and colorful medals on its chest; purple typewritten text along left edge at ULC

title: The Fugs, Ace of Cups, Allmen Joy, Avalon Ballroom, April 12-14, 1968
